nodes.title: www.kayakproductions.com 2008 site
nodes.excerpt: I web designed the www.kayakproductions.com website using Dreamweaver, Photoshop, HTML and CSS. (Update: this website from 2008 no longer exists.) In the process I make it more user friendly and google friendly. As a result it shot up the Google rankings and received a boost in visitors. The original site was in a strong red [â€¦]
